dataList.name: นาฬิกา
dataList.desc: Turn End: if this unit's [LimitedTime] is evenly divisible by 60, gain 2 [SlashDamageUp] and 2 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn

dataList.name: เวลาที่หลงเหลือ
dataList.desc: If this unit is in [TimeAcceleration] state, deal 10% of the damage it dealt On Hit as bonus damage in the Skill's Sin Affinity (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: นาฬิกา
dataList.desc: Turn End: if this unit's [LimitedTime], or the sum of [OwnTime] is evenly divisible by 60, gain 2 [SlashDamageUp] and 2 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn

dataList.desc: If this unit is in [EquitableDistribution] state, deal 10% of the damage it dealt On Hit as bonus damage in the Skill's Sin Affinity (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: เร่งเวลาอัตราสูง
dataList.desc: Turn End: if this unit is alive, apply 1 [Protection] next turn to a random Part on The Time Ripper.
